member.name: T:Sempra.IniFile
member.summary: Create a New INI file to store or load data based on a class at http://www.codeproject.com/csharp/cs_ini.asp

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an object for accessing an INI file

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.WriteValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Write a string to the INI file

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.WriteValue(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write an integer to the INI file

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.WriteValue(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Write a boolean value to the INI file

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.WriteValue(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)
member.summary: Write a list of values to the INI file

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.ReadValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a string from the INI file
member.param: Value to return if Key not found

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.ReadValue(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads an integer from the INI file
member.param: Value to return if Key not found

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.ReadValue(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reads a boolean value from the INI file
member.param: Value to return if Key not found

member.name: M:Sempra.IniFile.ReadValue(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a list of values from a section in the INI file
